title: This Heart of Mine
description: *This is the third and final book in The Raine Series. WARNING contains mature content and languageKayla seems to have it all. She has a wonderful man who would go to the ends of the earth for her and a family that seems to support her regardless of the consequences.But is it enough to help her face her demons and to truly find happiness within her heart?Madison never thought he would be faced with so many life altering decisions at such a young age. he wants to do right by Kayla and his family, but when old wounds reopen he finds himself questioning every choice he has ever made.Life isn't all it seems for these two and they're coming to the realization that there will always be someone wanting to come along and destroy it all.Will following her heart prove to be the right decision, or will it be the one thing that could make the only man she's ever loved, say good-bye for good?
author: Amanda  Bennett
